text:
The charging official shall serve the Counts and Allegations on each named individual person or business entity in a manner ensuring confirmation of delivery. For example, service may be achieved by United States Postal Service certified mail, return receipt requested or with other delivery confirmation, hand delivery (messenger service) or other commercial delivery service that provides written confirmation of delivery. 
     The charging official shall also serve the Counts and Allegations on the Controller and the City Attorney. 
(Added by Ord. 8-04, File No. 031503, App. 1/16/2004)

heading.catch_text: SERVICE OF THE COUNTS AND ALLEGATIONS.
